title: Space explorer
text: App about space, NASA, our solar system and more.
content: A React app using TypeScript, Redux, SCSS, and MaterialUI to explore space, NASA, and our solar system.

title: To-do App
text: A regular TODO app with several functionalities.
content: A React, TypeScript, Redux, and SCSS-powered app for task management, featuring add, edit, and delete functions.

title: Destiny 2 react app
content: A React app that integrates with Destiny 2's API to fetch and display game-related data.

title: Cook-blog
text: Cook-Blog App with Login and Register Options.
content: A cooking app for exploring, creating, and managing recipes. Built with React and CSS.

title: Stopwatch
content: A simple stopwatch app to track elapsed time, pause, clear, and continue the timer.

title: Multi-tool API
text: An API tool providing endpoints for numerous projects and usages.
content: A Node.js and Express.js backend serving multiple projects through various API endpoints.
